title: David Mandel Talks 'Veep,' 'Curb,' and 'Seinfeld' (Ep. 149)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald sit down with 'Veep' showrunner David Mandel to discuss making a political comedy in today’s climate. Then, Mandel shares stories about working on two other comedy mega-hits, ‘Curb Your Enthusiasm’ and ‘Seinfeld.’
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
